p: Media also contributes substantially to health awareness and promotion, making it an essential mediator for health communication. It plays an important role in changing attitudes and intentions, and in influencing health behavior. ‘Health communication’ is a broad term, defined as the study or use of communication techniques to improve the health sector [ 12]. Media’s effectiveness in health communication lies in strong written, verbal, and visual communication strategies that can impact public views and perceptions [ 2].
